name: Short title
text:
ARTICLE 3. [OLD]
COMMERCIAL PAPER
 
     REPEALED.  L 1991, c 118, §5.
 
ARTICLE 3.
NEGOTIABLE INSTRUMENTS
 
PART 1.  GENERAL PROVISIONS AND DEFINITIONS
 
     §490:3-101  Short title.  This article may be cited as Uniform Commercial Code--Negotiable Instruments. [L 1991, c 118, pt of §1]
